item.title: EP 359 - A Kevin Spacey Christmas!
item.itunes:title: A Kevin Spacey Christmas!
item.description:
Suicide Prevention Hotline

Call 1-800-273-8255

 

National Suicide Prevention Lifeline

https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org/

 

Today we want to talk about Bigfoot but spend the whole time talking about Kevin Spacey’s Christmas video!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Minecraft Server

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

KTWK

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WCuuKhjLB0Q

 

Kevin Spacey won’t face sexual assault charges after his accuser dies

https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2019/10/30/kevin-spacey-sexual-assault-charges-dies/

 

Kevin Spacey Won’t Be Charged in Sexual Assault Case After Accuser Dies

https://variety.com/2019/biz/news/kevin-spacey-sexual-assault-case-massage-therapist-dies-1203387060/

 

Kevin Spacey Accuser Found Dead After Being Struck by Vehicle

https://popculture.com/trending/2019/05/02/kevin-spacey-accuser-found-dead-after-being-struck-by-vehicle/

Woman killed by car in Quincy served time for death threats

https://www.patriotledger.com/news/20190301/woman-killed-by-car-in-quincy-served-time-for-death-threats

 

Actor Anthony Rapp: Kevin Spacey Made A Sexual Advance Toward Me When I Was 14

https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/adambvary/anthony-rapp-kevin-spacey-made-sexual-advance-when-i-was-14

 

Kevin Spacey

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Spacey#Sexual_assault_trial_and_lawsuit

 

Disgraced Kevin Spacey Caught Up In Murder Scandal!

https://radaronline.com/exclusives/2019/05/kevin-spacey-accuser-dead-car-crash/

 

Woman killed by car in Quincy served time for death threats

https://www.patriotledger.com/news/20190301/woman-killed-by-car-in-quincy-served-time-for-death-threats

 

Kevin Spacey Accuser Found Dead After Being Struck by Vehicle

https://popculture.com/trending/2019/05/02/kevin-spacey-accuser-found-dead-after-being-struck-by-vehicle/

 

Kevin Spacey accuser dies by suicide day after actor posts 'kill them with kindness' video

https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/news/kevin-spacey-accuser-dies-by-suicide-day-after-actor-posts-kill-them-with-kindness-video

 

‘Can He Be Serious? I’m Dead Serious’: Kevin Spacey Posts Bizarre Holiday Video

https://www.mediaite.com/news/can-he-be-serious-im-dead-serious-kevin-spacey-posts-bizarre-holiday-video/

 

Kevin Spacey resurfaces in creepy new video to share a holiday message

https://pagesix.com/2019/12/24/kevin-spacey-resurfaces-in-creepy-new-video-to-share-a-holiday-message/

 

Norwegian royal claims Kevin Spacey groped his crown jewels

https://pagesix.com/2017/12/07/norwegian-royal-claims-kevin-spacey-groped-his-crown-jewels/?

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
